title: Handle a Damaged Container at the Gate
description: A truck arrives to drop off an export container, but the gate inspection camera identifies significant damage.

tasks.description: The gate system flags the container with a 'Damage Exception' based on the OCR/camera inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk receives an alert with photos showing a large hole in the container wall.

tasks.description: Deny entry to the container and inform the driver of the damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk explains that the container cannot be accepted in its current condition.

tasks.description: Log the incident and instruct the driver to move to a holding area to await instructions from the cargo owner.
tasks.expected_outcome: The event is logged, and the driver is directed out of the main traffic flow.
